org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.database

Class BGWLibrary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bicycleGeometryWorkshop.database.BGWLibrary

  • public class BGWLibrary
extends java.lang.Object
    This class handles all the Library database calls. The library is used for importing or exporting common components in projects. This holds an instance of the Database class and points it at the local library file: './Library/library.bgw'.

    • Method Detail

      • getLibraryPath

        public java.lang.String getLibraryPath()
        Get the library path. This should point to a subdirectory named 'Library' with the library file being named 'library.bgw'.
        Returns:
        The library file path.

      • openLibrary

        Open the Library

      • closeLibrary

        public void closeLibrary()
        Close the Library.

      • exportComponent

        public void exportComponent(BaseComponent component)
        Export a component to the library.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to export

      • importComponent

        public void importComponent(BaseComponent component)
        Import a component from the library. This detects bicycles and handles them as a special case.
        Parameters:
        component - The component to import from the database.
